text: Christmas, with Love is a Christmas album and the fourth studio album by British recording artist Leona Lewis. It was released on 29 November 2013, by Syco and RCA Records. It was the last album that Lewis made with Syco and RCA. She left them to sign with Island Records and Def Jam Recordings in 2015. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:Leona Lewis albums Category:Christmas albums Category:Gospel albums Category:R&B; albums Category:RCA Records albums
title: Christmas, with Love
